snippet.title: WAR IS COMING | SONG of IRON 2  Announcement Trailer!
snippet.description:
Get the Steam demo now when you join the news letter!  - https://www.songofiron.com

The Imperium comes and Odin calls you to war. 

Fight your way through this visceral gritty side scrolling viking adventure in the return to the Nordic-inspired world of Song of Iron. Embrace the “Chain breaker” name given to you by Odin. Seek out the viking clans and free them from thralldom. Hunt down Wolfric, who killed the one you loved. 

Unite the clans, chase vengeance, fight the Imperium!



---Join the Song of Iron party!---
web - https://www.songofiron.com/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/SongofIron
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/song_of_iron/
Discord - https://www.discord.gg/GqtgsmC
